Description: Pottery ostrakon: Calpurnius requests two lyres from Onnophris. The text may refer to the organisation of a concert for the troops.
Curator's comments: Originally published by Sijpesteijn 1973 (no. 3) with further comemnts by Bagnall 1975, . See also comments in the original sale catalogue. Bibliography: Bagnall, R. 1975, 'The Roman garrison at Laptopolis', Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists 12/4, 135-144. Sijpesteijn, P.J. 1973, ‘Letters on ostraca’, Talanta V, 72-84.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2018 28 May-23 Jul, Reading, Ure Museum of Greek Archaeology, Music and Materiality
Acquisition date: 1988 (See sale catalogue, Writing and letter in antiquity XII (1988), no. 27a.)
